name: auto
description:
1.Modified garbled Asian languages
2.Normal mode
    ;;      Exit without saving
    ,,      Save and exit
    F5   Encoding format
    F7   Clean ^M (which file from windows)
3.Insert mode
    ;;      return Normal mode
    ,,      return Normal mode
    mm      return Normal mode
    <Alt-j>  Down
    <Alt-k> Up
    <Alt-h> Left
    <Alt-l>  Right
4.When writing c, cpp ,... code, the code is automatically formatted
    For example:   you input a==3;
    auto.vim           a  ==  3;
5.Both c, cpp, or python,shell,perl code, F2 key to compile and debug
install_details: Simply drop this file into your $HOME/.vim/plugin directory.
